[![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/fog/fog-aws.png)](https://codeclimate.com/github/fog/fog-aws)


## Installation

Add this line to your application's Gemfile:

```ruby
gem 'fog-aws'
```

And then execute:

    $ bundle

Or install it yourself as:

    $ gem install fog-aws
